titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MENTAL HEALTH PREDICTION AND DETECTION INDICATOR (AT ANTENATAL BOOKING) - Description

div.p: MENTAL HEALTH PREDICTION AND DETECTION INDICATOR (AT ANTENATAL BOOKING) is the same as attribute MENTAL HEALTH PREDICTION AND DETECTION INDICATOR to indicate whether the recommended questions for prediction and detection of mental health issues have been asked of the mother at the APPOINTMENT DATE (FORMAL ANTENATAL BOOKING).
